body:
Hi,
Thank you for reaching out to us.

So, we can publish your new post or insert your link in published posts (prices are the same).

ARTICLES
Select your Tier according to your link:

- Tier 1 - Basic Post: 175 USD (Basic links). Basic Links are related to Logistics, HealthCare, Education, Architecture, Nonprofit Organization and Training.
- Tier 2 - General Post: 250 USD (General links).
- Tier 3 - Technology Post: 350 USD (Software, Tech, Social Media, Gaming Links)
- Tier 4 - Finance Post: 450 USD (Loans, Banking, Insurance, Investments, Money, Finance and Essay Links).
- Tier 5 - Forex Post: 550 USD (Forex and Trading Links).
- Tier 6 - Crypto Post: 650 USD (Crypto Links)
- Tier 7 - Sports Betting or iGaming Post: 950 USD.
- Tier 8 - Casino Post: 1450 USD (Casino and Gambling Links)
- Tier 9 - Not Licensed Casino: 2500 USD
- Tier 10 - Political Post: 7500 USD

REVIEWS

A review article is a type of academic paper that provides a comprehensive overview of existing research on a specific topic.

- Additional rate over ARTICLE: +30%

LISTICLES
A listicle is an article or other piece of writing presented in list form. Such as"5 Best Budgeting Apps to Help You Save Money" or "10 Credit Cards with the Lowest Interest Rates"

- Additional rateover ARTICLE: +40%

EXTRAS

- E1: Op-ed pieceorBylined article:We include: bio (2/3 lines), author's name and author's headshot. Extra: 100 USD (you must add this fee to the Tier price above)
- E2: Post in Homepage:Extra: 300 USD
- E3: Post in Homepage on Main Banner: 500 USD
- E4: Post in Main Menu:1000 USD
- E5: Branded Article: 500 USD
- E6: Extra Link: 150 USD

Branded articles are articles that are written about a specific brand or product. They are typically written in a promotional tone and are designed to increase brand awareness and sales.
Branded articles may be written by the brand itself or by a third party on behalf of the brand.

PAYMENTS

- Payment in advance.
- We accept PayPal.

DISCOUNTS

- We don't have discounts for single orders.
- We don't have discounts based on potential future orders.

- For Resellers:

- Orders over $2000 have a 10% discount.
- Orders over $4000 have a 20% discount.
- Orders over $6000 have a 30% discount.

WRITING YOUR ARTICLE
We can also write your original article with 1000-1500 words, with FAQs, image: $100

GOOGLE
Google & Google News will index the post 10-15 minutes after we publish the content.

GUIDELINES

- Only quality guest posts allowed.
- Article should have 800-1200 words.
- It must be unique, unpublished elsewhere, and must pass Copyscape.

- You should share the main keyword of the article.
- All links are permanent.
- The article must have: 1 do-follow link, 1 or 2authority link and 1 or 2 internal link. Our team can also add the authority link and internal link at 80 USD.
- All guest posts are not marked as sponsored posts.
- We can publish within 24 hours or faster!

Best Regards,
Michael Anderson

COYYN - Digital Capital

On Thursday, June 5th, 2025 at 06:06, Manager Nightlightmedia <manager@nightlitemedia.com> wrote:

> My name is Mark, and I work with an SEO agency that helps clients improve their website visibility. We'd like to propose a mutually beneficial partnership for your site.
>

> Is it possible to place such content on your platform?
>
> What would be the cost per article (regular or casino-themed)?
>
> Are gambling-related topics allowed?
>
> Do you have other websites where we could collaborate?
>
> Looking forward to hearing from you soon!
>
> Best regards, Mark
